attributes.action: Instruct Local Health Trusts to stop employing European Doctors on short term contracts
attributes.additional_details:
In my experience some European doctors whose first language is  not  English,     when employed   on short term contracts,  or when drafted in for bank holiday  "out of hours"   do not  communicate  effectively  with patients  or their  carers.

I suggest that  the practice of  drafting  in doctors from Europe, whose first language is not English,    be reviewed  and curtailed  until new procedures have been developed.
